## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

```{r}
firesx = fires %>% filter(FireYr=="2019") 
unique(firesx$IDobj)
```
# Overview

This script process landscape/patch statistics by class burned/unburned **For Each patch** for the 2020 fires in Northeastern Siberia. Fires are processed individually.


[Landscapemetrics package details](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/landscapemetrics/landscapemetrics.pdf)



# 154

## Clear workspace
```{r}
rm(list=ls()) 
```

## Packages
```{r}
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(landscapemetrics)
library(dplyr)
```

## Raster
```{r}
r1 <- raster("../data/2019Binary/2019BinaryImg_154.tif")
```

## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

## Select fire perimeter
```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2019") %>%
  filter(IDobj==154)

```

## Limit Raster to Fire perimeter
```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```

## Define Landscape
```{r}
landscape = crop_r1
```

## Calculate Landscape metrics and export to csv
```{r}
landscape %>% 
  calculate_lsm(.,  what = c("lsm_p_area", "lsm_p_core")) %>%  
  mutate(IDobj = 154) %>% 
  write.csv(., '../outputs/PatchSummaryEqualArea/2019patchFire_154.csv',  row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(landscapemetrics)
library(dplyr)
```

## Raster
```{r}
r1 <- raster("../data/2019Binary/2019BinaryImg_789.tif")
```

## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

## Select fire perimeter
```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2019") %>%
  filter(IDobj==789)

```

## Limit Raster to Fire perimeter
```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```

## Define Landscape
```{r}
landscape = crop_r1
```

## Calculate Landscape metrics and export to csv
```{r}
landscape %>% 
  calculate_lsm(.,  what = c("lsm_p_area", "lsm_p_core")) %>%  
  mutate(IDobj = 789) %>% 
  write.csv(., '../outputs/PatchSummaryEqualArea/2019patchFire_789.csv',  row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(landscapemetrics)
library(dplyr)
```

## Raster
```{r}
r1 <- raster("../data/2019Binary/2019BinaryImg_999.tif")
```

## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

## Select fire perimeter
```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2019") %>%
  filter(IDobj==999)

```

## Limit Raster to Fire perimeter
```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```

## Define Landscape
```{r}
landscape = crop_r1
```

## Calculate Landscape metrics and export to csv
```{r}
landscape %>% 
  calculate_lsm(.,  what = c("lsm_p_area", "lsm_p_core")) %>%  
  mutate(IDobj = 999) %>% 
  write.csv(., '../outputs/PatchSummaryEqualArea/2019patchFire_999.csv',  row.names = FALSE)
```


```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%

```

## Clear workspace
```{r}
rm(list=ls()) 
```

## Packages
```{r}
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(landscapemetrics)
library(dplyr)
```

## Raster
```{r}
r1 <- raster("../data/2019Binary/2019BinaryImg_1647.tif")
```

## Fire perimeters 
```{r}
fires = st_read("../data/NESiberiaFires/NESiberiaFires2001-2020.shp", "NESiberiaFires2001-2020")
```

## Select fire perimeter
```{r}
fire1 = fires %>%
  filter(FireYr=="2019") %>%
  filter(IDobj==1647)

```

## Limit Raster to Fire perimeter
```{r}
crop_r1 = mask(r1, fire1)
```

## Define Landscape
```{r}
landscape = crop_r1
```

## Calculate Landscape metrics and export to csv
```{r}
landscape %>% 
  calculate_lsm(.,  what = c("lsm_p_area", "lsm_p_core")) %>%  
  mutate(IDobj = 1647) %>% 
  write.csv(., '../outputs/PatchSummaryEqualArea/2019patchFire_1647.csv',  row.names = FALSE)
```
